resources.string: Let\'s get you started with some basic information.
Please enter all of the entries below.
Custom your weight or height if needed:
If you leave the row empty, your result will be calculated based on given information in your profile.
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tCalories/day is needed to maintain your current body composition.
Please enter the blood markers you have in hand.
Lower than normal range - related symptoms:
Higher than normal range - related symptoms:
TSH, also referred to as Thyroid-Stimulating Hormone, is a pituitary hormone that stimulates the thyroid gland, which is responsible for the metabolism of almost every tissue is in the body.

If you are experiencing any symptoms including increased sensitivity to cold, weight gain, heavier than normal or irregular menstrual periods(women) or fatigue, check out Thrives low TSH balancing strategies.

If you are experiencing any symptoms including increased sensitivity to cold, weight gain, heavier than normal or irregular menstrual periods(women) or fatigue, check out Thrive\'s low TSH balancing strategies.
Cortisol is the primary stress hormone in the human body.

Extremely low levels of cortisol can lead to something known as Addison\'s disease, which is rather uncommon. Symptoms can range from darkening of the skin, hair loss, sexual dysfunction in women, low blood sugar levels and extreme weight loss. This condition because of its novelty is only treated by healthcare professionals however there are some immediate steps you can take mentioned in Thrive\'s low cortisol recommendations.

If you are experiencing symptoms including muscle weakness, unmanageable fatigue, difficulty concentrating or weight gain (bloating), there is a very high chance you have stressed yourself out and have elevated levels of cortisol in your body. Check out Thrive\'s high cortisol recommendations.
Creatinine is a byproduct of the bodies metabolic activities and can be used to accurately gauge ones kidney function.

The more uncommon problem of having low creatinine levels can result in symptoms of various other diseases such as a muscle disease causing muscle weakness, atrophying muscles or liver diseases causing jaundice and abnormal stools.
If you are experiencing any of the following symptoms including urination issues, muscle cramp, chest pain, increase in thirst or heavy fatigue. Check out Thrive\'s high creatinine remedies.
Blood glucose is a sugar that the bloodstream carries to all cells in the body to supply energy. These levels can accurately indicate any chance of diabetes or increased insulin sensitivity.
On the other hand if you experience extreme sweating, irritability, increase in hunger, nervousness, weakness and anxiety, this could imply you are experiencing low blood glucose levels.

If you are experiencing any of the following symptoms including a very dry mouth, extreme thirst, light headedness, a fast heart beat followed with a weak pulse, read Thrive\'s high blood glucose recommendation\'s.
Iron is an essential element for blood production. It is also essential for oxygen distribution in the body.
If you are experiencing any of the following symptoms including getting pale, lack of energy, shortness of breath, rapid heartbeat and extreme fatigue, check out Thrives low Iron recommendations.
If you are experiencing any of the following symptoms including getting pale, lack of energy, shortness of breath, rapid heartbeat and extreme fatigue, check out Thrive\'s high Iron recommendations.

As a healthy male if you are having any symptoms of low testosterone levels including lack of appetite, decrease in sexual libido, worse body fat distribution and depression. If you find yourself with such symptoms, check out Thrive\'s testosterone balancing strategies below.

High testosterone usually has no negative implications but in extreme cases of high testosterone we can see an acceleration of the maturing of male specific characteristics or an increase in DHT levels which might be causing rapid hair changes or even hair loss.

Estradiol, also referred to as estrogen, is one of the most vital sexual hormone for women. It regulates to a large context much of women\'s sexual function / development, metabolism of important metabolites, insulin sensitivity and body composition.
As a healthy women if you are having irregular periods, hot flashes, mood swings, fatigue or depression, check out Thrive\'s low estrogen balancing approach below.
n the other hand experiencing symptoms such as bloating, cold hands and feet, low sex drive and hair loss can point towards high estrogen, check out Thrive\'s high estrogen balancing approach below.

If you are not aware of any specific deficiencies and have any of the following symptoms including heart condition risk, lack of deep sleep, improper digestion numbness and weakness of limbs or memory loss, check out Thrives general recommendations that might be a quick fix.

If you are not aware of any specific deficiencies and have any of the following symptoms including severe pms, extreme fatigue, depression, lack of sleep, hair fall or skin or nail problems, check out Thrives general recommendations that might be a quick fix.
